FuncDef: This command displays the transmission for ETH-CC, ETH-AIS, and ETH-CFM Grace (ETH-VSM or ETH-ED) using a character representation for each protocol per MEP. ETH-CC is expanded to include columns for RDI, Port Status TLV, and Interface Status TLV. The additional ETH-CC columns represent the actual transmitting value of the TLV, or "Absent" if not present in the ETH-CC PDU. These additional ETH-CC columns are represented with a series of dashes if the ETH-CC column under the TxPDU is a dash ("-") or "c".

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MD index. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the MA index. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the local MEP ID. Values-1 to 8191.
